settlement-id.description: The unique identifier for a settlement.

settlement-start-date.description: The start date of the settlement period.

settlement-end-date.description: The end date of the settlement period.

deposit-date.description: The date and time when the payment was deposited into the seller's account.

total-amount.description: The total amount in the settlement.

currency.description: The currency in which the financial transactions are recorded.

transaction-type.description: The type of transaction (e.g., order, refund).

order-id.description: The unique identifier for an order.

merchant-order-id.description: The unique identifier for a merchant order.

adjustment-id.description: The unique identifier for an adjustment made to the settlement.

shipment-id.description: The unique identifier for a shipment.

marketplace-name.description: The name of the marketplace where the transaction occurred.

shipment-fee-type.description: The type of fee related to shipment.

shipment-fee-amount.description: The amount of fee related to shipment.

order-fee-type.description: The type of fee associated with an order.

order-fee-amount.description: The amount of fee associated with an order.

fulfillment-id.description: The unique identifier for the fulfillment of an order.

posted-date.description: The date and time when the transaction was posted.

order-item-code.description: The code assigned to an order item.

merchant-order-item-id.description: The unique identifier for a specific item in a merchant order.

merchant-adjustment-item-id.description: The unique identifier for a merchant adjustment item.

sku.description: The stock keeping unit for a product.

quantity-purchased.description: The quantity of a product purchased in the order.

price-type.description: The type of price for a product.

price-amount.description: The amount of price for a product.

item-related-fee-type.description: The type of fee related to a specific item in the order.

item-related-fee-amount.description: The amount of fee related to a specific item in the order.

misc-fee-amount.description: The amount of miscellaneous fee included in the settlement.

other-fee-amount.description: The amount of other fees included in the settlement.

other-fee-reason-description.description: The description of the reason for other fees.

promotion-id.description: The unique identifier for a promotion.

promotion-amount.description: The amount of promotion discount applied.

direct-payment-type.description: The type of direct payment made to the seller.

direct-payment-amount.description: The amount of direct payment made to the seller.

other-amount.description: The amount of other miscellaneous transactions.

report_id.description: The unique identifier for a settlement report.

dataEndTime.description: The end time of the data in the report.
